text: Toto khulutsi okhukalukhana khwobweni bubwo mwikulu, khokhwitsa okhuhelesia Kibla eshia omwoyo kukwo kuchamile, kho lenjia obweni bubwo ebuleka womusikiti kwo luyali,(Makkah) Newosiwosi amuli mulenjie obweni bwenyu mumbeka mwayo, Ne toto balia bahebwa eshitabu bamanyile mbu ni obwatoto okhurula khu Nyasaye wabu,Ne shibili mbu Nyasaye shalolonga kabakholanga tawe
